channel.title: hacks on Benjamin Rizkowsky Resume
channel.description: Recent content in hacks on Benjamin Rizkowsky Resume

item.title: Docker Hacks
item.description: I’ve found this snippet handy when you need to restart the docker daemon and want to resume currently running containers. docker ps |tail -n +2 > /docker.running cat /docker.running service docker restart docker start $(awk '{print $1}' /docker.running)
